com.pcloud.sdk

Interface RemoteFile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RemoteData, RemoteEntry

    public interface RemoteFile
extends RemoteEntry, RemoteData
    An abstraction over a file entry for a file on a pCloud account's filesystem.
    See Also:
    RemoteEntry, RemoteFolder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String contentType()

      Create a file link for this file

        asFile, asFolder, copy, copy, created, delete, id, isFile, isFolder, lastModified, move, name, parentFolderId, rename

      • Methods inherited from interface com.pcloud.sdk.RemoteData

        byteStream, download, download, source

    • Method Detail

      • fileId

        long fileId()
        Returns:
        the file identifier.

      • contentType

        java.lang.String contentType()
        Returns:
        the content type of the RemoteFile.

        For more information on content types, see here.

      • size

        long size()
        Returns:
        the size of the file in bytes.

      • hash

        java.lang.String hash()
        Returns:
        the hash of the file content. Can be used to detect content changes.

      • createFileLink

        FileLink createFileLink(DownloadOptions options)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        ApiError
        Create a file link for this file

        The method will block until the link is created or an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        options - DownloadOptions to be used creating the link. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        a FileLink for this file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on a network error
        ApiError - if error code is returned from pCloud's API
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on a null options argument.

      • createFileLink

        FileLink createFileLink()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        ApiError
        Create a file link for this file

        The method will block until the link is created or an exception is thrown.

        Returns:
        a FileLink for this file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on a network error
        ApiError - if error code is returned from pCloud's API
